trans-unit.source: Represents a control that displays a list of data items.
trans-unit.target: Representerar en kontroll som visar en lista över dataobjekt.

trans-unit.source: ListView is an <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl>, which means it can contain a collection of objects of any type (such as string, image, or panel).
trans-unit.target: ListView är en <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl>, vilket innebär att den kan innehålla en samling objekt av en annan typ (till exempel sträng-, image- eller panelen).</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl>

trans-unit.source: For more information, see the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl> class.
trans-unit.target: Mer information finns i <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl>klassen.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl>

trans-unit.source: The presentation of the data items in a ListView is defined by its view mode, which is specified by the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ListView.View%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Presentation av dataobjekt i en ListView definieras av dess läget som anges av den <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ListView.View%2A>egenskapen.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ListView.View%2A>

trans-unit.source: [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] provides a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridView> view mode that partitions the ListView data item content into columns.
trans-unit.target: [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)]ger en <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridView>visningsläge som partitionerar ListView data objektets innehåll till kolumner.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridView>

trans-unit.source: The properties and methods on <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridView> and its related classes style and specify the content of the columns.
trans-unit.target: Egenskaper och metoder i <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridView>och dess relaterade klasser format och ange innehållet i kolumnerna.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridView>

trans-unit.source: The following illustration shows a ListView with a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridView> view.
trans-unit.target: Följande bild visar en ListView med en <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridView>vy.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridView>

trans-unit.source: ![ListView with GridView output](~/add/media/listviewgridview.JPG "ListView with GridView output") You can also define custom views by creating a class that derives from <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ViewBase>.
trans-unit.target: ![ListView med GridView utgående](~/add/media/listviewgridview.JPG "ListView med GridView utgående") du kan också definiera anpassade vyer genom att skapa en klass som härleds från <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ViewBase>.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ViewBase>

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [How to: Create a Custom View Mode for a ListView](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Mer information finns i [så här: skapa en anpassad visningsläge för en ListView](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: If you define a custom <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl.ItemContainerStyle%2A> for a ListView control and also define an <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl.ItemTemplate%2A>, you must include a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentPresenter> in the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl.ItemContainerStyle%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Om du definierar en anpassad <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl.ItemContainerStyle%2A>en ListView styra och också definiera ett <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl.ItemTemplate%2A>måste du inkludera en <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentPresenter>i <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl.ItemContainerStyle%2A>.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl.ItemContainerStyle%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentPresenter> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl.ItemTemplate%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl.ItemContainerStyle%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentPresenter> is required for the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl.ItemTemplate%2A> to work correctly.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentPresenter>krävs för den <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl.ItemTemplate%2A>ska fungera korrekt.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl.ItemTemplate%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentPresenter>

trans-unit.source: To avoid alignment issues in a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridView> view mode, do not add content or set properties that affect the width of an item in the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl.ItemContainerStyle%2A> of a ListView.
trans-unit.target: Att undvika problem med justering i ett <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridView>visningsläge, inte lägga till innehåll eller ange egenskaper som påverkar bredden på ett objekt i den <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl.ItemContainerStyle%2A>i en ListView.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl.ItemContainerStyle%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridView>

trans-unit.source: To prevent alignment issues, use properties and templates that are defined for the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridView> view mode.
trans-unit.target: För att förhindra justering problem, använda egenskaper och mallar som har definierats för den <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridView>visningsläge.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridView>

trans-unit.source: This includes properties and templates that are defined for classes that are used in a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridView> view mode, such as <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridViewColumn> and <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridViewColumnHeader>.
trans-unit.target: Detta omfattar egenskaper och mallar som har definierats för klasser som används i <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridView>läget för till exempel <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridViewColumn>och <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridViewColumnHeader>.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridViewColumnHeader> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridViewColumn> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridView>

trans-unit.source: Two ListView controls cannot share the same view.
trans-unit.target: Två ListView-kontroller kan inte dela samma vy.

trans-unit.source: To specify a view that can be used more than one time, use templates or styles.
trans-unit.target: Använda mallar eller format för att ange en vy som kan användas mer än en gång.

trans-unit.source: For an example of a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridView> and other custom views that are defined as reusable resources, see [ListView with Multiple Views Sample](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=160013).
trans-unit.target: Ett exempel på en <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridView>och andra anpassade vyer som har definierats som återanvändbara resurser, se [ListView med flera vyer exempel](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=160013).</xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridView>

trans-unit.source: Do not use the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Control.HorizontalContentAlignment%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Control.VerticalContentAlignment%2A> properties for ListView content that is displayed by using a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridView>.
trans-unit.target: Använd inte den <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Control.HorizontalContentAlignment%2A>och <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Control.VerticalContentAlignment%2A>Egenskaper för ListView-innehåll som visas med hjälp av en <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridView>.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridView> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Control.VerticalContentAlignment%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Control.HorizontalContentAlignment%2A>

trans-unit.source: To specify the alignment of content in a column of a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridView>, define a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridViewColumn.CellTemplate%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Ange justering av innehåll i en kolumn i en <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridView>definiera <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridViewColumn.CellTemplate%2A>.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridViewColumn.CellTemplate%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridView>

trans-unit.source: Displaying a large number of items may cause performance issues.
trans-unit.target: Visa ett stort antal objekt som kan orsaka prestandaproblem.

trans-unit.source: See [Optimizing Performance: Controls](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md) for more information.
trans-unit.target: Se [optimera prestanda: kontroller](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md) för mer information.

trans-unit.source: Customizing the ListView Control To apply the same property settings to multiple ListView controls, use the <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.Style%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Anpassa den ListView-kontrollen ska använda samma egenskapsinställningar för flera ListView-kontroller, Använd den <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.Style%2A>egenskapen.</xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.Style%2A>

trans-unit.source: You can modify the default <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ControlTemplate> to give the control a unique appearance.
trans-unit.target: Du kan ändra standard <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ControlTemplate>att ge unik för kontrollen.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ControlTemplate>

trans-unit.source: For more information about creating a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ControlTemplate>, see [Customizing the Appearance of an Existing Control by Creating a ControlTemplate](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Mer information om hur du skapar en <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ControlTemplate>, se [anpassa utseendet på en befintlig kontroll genom att skapa en ControlTemplate](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ControlTemplate>

trans-unit.source: To see the parts and states that are specific to the ListView, see [ListView Styles and Templates](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Delar och tillstånd som är specifika för ListView finns [ListView-format och mallar](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: Dependency properties for this control might be set by the control’s default style.
trans-unit.target: Beroendeegenskaper för den här kontrollen kan ställas in av kontrollens standardformat.

trans-unit.source: If a property is set by a default style, the property might change from its default value when the control appears in the application.
trans-unit.target: Om en egenskapen anges av ett standardformat kan egenskapen ändras från standardvärdet när kontrollen visas i programmet.

trans-unit.source: The default style is determined by which desktop theme is used when the application is running.
trans-unit.target: Standardformatet som bestäms av vilka tema används när programmet körs.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Default WPF Themes](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=158252).
trans-unit.target: Mer information finns i [standard WPF teman](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=158252).

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > Setting a visual property will only have an effect if that property is both present in ListView control's default template and is set by using a .
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Visual egenskapen endast har betydelse om egenskapen är båda finns i ListView-kontrollen standardmall och anges genom att använda en.

trans-unit.source: You can find a list of visual properties in the "Changing the Visual Structure of a Control" section in [Customizing the Appearance of an Existing Control by Creating a ControlTemplate](../Topic/Customizing%20the%20Appearance%20of%20an%20Existing%20Control%20by%20Creating%20a%20ControlTemplate.md).
trans-unit.target: Du hittar en lista över visuella egenskaper i avsnittet "Ändra Visual struktur för ett Control" i [anpassa utseendet på en befintlig kontroll genom att skapa en ControlTemplate](../Topic/Customizing%20the%20Appearance%20of%20an%20Existing%20Control%20by%20Creating%20a%20ControlTemplate.md).

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ListView"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Initierar en ny instans av den <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ListView"> </xref> klass.

trans-unit.source: Removes all templates, styles, and bindings for the object that is displayed as a <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ListViewItem"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Tar bort alla mallar, format och bindningar för det objekt som visas som en <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ListViewItem"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ListViewItem"></xref> container to clear.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ListViewItem"> </xref> behållare för att ta bort.

trans-unit.source: The object that the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ListViewItem"></xref> contains.
trans-unit.target: Objektet som den <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ListViewItem"> </xref> innehåller.

trans-unit.source: Creates and returns a new <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ListViewItem"></xref> container.
trans-unit.target: Skapar och returnerar en ny <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ListViewItem"> </xref> behållare.

trans-unit.source: A new <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ListViewItem"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: En ny <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ListViewItem"> </xref> kontroll.

trans-unit.source: Determines whether an object is a <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ListViewItem"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Avgör om ett objekt är en <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ListViewItem"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The object to evaluate.
trans-unit.target: Objektet som ska utvärderas.

trans-unit.source: if the item is a ; otherwise, .
trans-unit.target: if the item is a ; otherwise, .

trans-unit.source: Defines an <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer"></xref> for the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ListView"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: Definierar en <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer"> </xref> för den <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ListView"> </xref> kontroll.

trans-unit.source: Returns a <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.ListViewAutomationPeer"></xref> object for the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ListView"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: Returnerar en <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.ListViewAutomationPeer"> </xref> objekt för den <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ListView"> </xref> kontroll.

trans-unit.source: Responds to an <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl.OnItemsChanged%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: Svarar på en <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl.OnItemsChanged%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.

trans-unit.source: This method is called when there is a change in the items collection of a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ListView> control.
trans-unit.target: Den här metoden anropas när det finns en ändring i objektmängden i en <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ListView>kontroll.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ListView>

trans-unit.source: The event arguments.
trans-unit.target: Händelseargument.

trans-unit.source: Sets the styles, templates, and bindings for a <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ListViewItem"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Anger format, mallar och bindningar för en <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ListViewItem"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: This method prepares a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ListViewItem> control for display according to the specified <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ListView.View%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Den här metoden förbereds en <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ListViewItem>kontroll för visning enligt angivna <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ListView.View%2A>.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ListView.View%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.ListViewItem>

trans-unit.source: An object that is a <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ListViewItem"></xref> or that can be converted into one.
trans-unit.target: Ett objekt som är en <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ListViewItem"> </xref> eller som kan konverteras till en.

trans-unit.source: The object to use to create the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ListViewItem"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Objektet som ska användas för att skapa den <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ListViewItem"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets an object that defines how the data is styled and organized in a <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ListView"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: Hämtar eller anger ett objekt som definierar hur data är formaterad och ordnade i en <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ListView"> </xref> kontroll.

trans-unit.source: The [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_titlewinfx](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-titlewinfx-md.md)] environment includes the configurable view mode named <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridView>.
trans-unit.target: Den [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_titlewinfx](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-titlewinfx-md.md)] miljö innehåller konfigurerbara visningsläge med namnet <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridView>.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridView>

trans-unit.source: You can also create a custom view that inherits from <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ViewBase>.
trans-unit.target: Du kan också skapa en anpassad vy som ärver från <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ViewBase>.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ViewBase>

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [How to: Create a Custom View Mode for a ListView](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Mer information finns i [så här: skapa en anpassad visningsläge för en ListView](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: ## Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |Identifier field|| |Metadata properties set to `true`|None| > [!NOTE] > The type of property metadata for this property is , not .
trans-unit.target: ## Beroendeegenskapsinformation ||| |-|-| | ID-fältet | | | Metadata egenskaperna `true`| Ingen | > [!NOTE] > Egenskapens metadata för den här egenskapen är , inte .

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ViewBase"></xref> object that specifies how to display information in the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ListView"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ViewBase"> </xref> objekt som anger hur du visar informationen i den <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ListView"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ListView.View*> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: Identifierar den <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ListView.View*>beroendeegenskap.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ListView.View*>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Som ska läggas till.
